channel.title: Steven G. Xu
channel.description: Recent content on Steven G. Xu

item.title: Codes
item.description: Bayesian Simultaneous Quantile Regression This is a visual demonstration of my current project. The objective is to simultaneously estimate nonlinear noncrossing quantile curves using Bayesian nonparametric approach. Bayesian Quantile Regression with Python Jupyter-notebook A simple implementation of Bayesian quantile regression using neural network and asymmetric Laplace likelihood. Posterior sampling is carried out by Hamilton Monte Carlo with Dual Averaging.

item.title: Publications
item.description: Online Unsupervised Wildfire Detection Using Satellite Imagery: Technical Report Presented at 2021 International Geoscience and Remote Sensing Symposium (IGARSS) Transportability from randomized trials to routine care: On initial HIV treatment with efavirenz and suicidal thoughts or behaviors Published in American Journal of Epidemiology Link Review of Simultaneous Quantile Regression Methods: Technical Report Ph.d. written preliminary exam (passed) Multivariate Process Monitoring using Canonical Variate Analysis: Poster @ 2019 SAS Intern Expo, Slides
